amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy (water power program) by $9 million and reduces funding for Departmental Administration by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $9 million and to reduce funding for Departmental Administration by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Ms. Bonamici.
